'080c4964-57e9-4290-b940-f8b444feffa5': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Between 2021 and 2023, the EU Oceans and Water Mission committed about 81 million Euros in funding to ten projects to address challenges linked to management and establishment of marine protected areas. An overview of these projects is provided in the infographics below, including a link to projects’ sites.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Between 2021 and 2023, the EU Oceans and Water Mission committed about 81 million Euros in funding to ten projects to address challenges linked to management and establishment of marine protected areas. An overview of these projects is provided in the infographics below, including a link to projects’ sites.\xa0\xa0'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '0c8639f0-8be5-4f29-9c5c-2f89f4c6f350': {'@type': 'dividerBlock', 'hidden': True, 'spacing': 's', 'styles': {}}, '0e978fa6-60c8-4cab-8ab2-f22b687593c0': {'@type': 'dividerBlock', 'hidden': True, 'section': True, 'spacing': 's', 'styles': {}}, '18ef3f5a-8797-4435-af6a-1e42a7adf600': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'The EU biodiversity strategy for 2030 highlights the importance of building a truly coherent trans-European network of protected areas through improving their connectivity. Thus, EEA identified the need to ensure sound scientific analysis when designating new MPAs.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'The '}, {'children': [{'text': 'EU biodiversity strategy for 2030'}], 'data': {'link': {'external': {'external_link': 'https://environment.ec.europa.eu/strategy/biodiversity-strategy-2030_en', 'target': '_blank'}}}, 'type': 'a'}, {'text': ' highlights the importance of building a truly coherent trans-European network of protected areas through improving their connectivity. Thus, EEA identified the need to ensure sound scientific analysis when designating new MPAs.\xa0'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '1fa76aab-c743-497c-84ae-0afcb50a81d3': {'@type': 'dividerBlock', 'hidden': True, 'section': True, 'spacing': 's', 'styles': {}}, '20ff3334-e317-4357-b717-3181dacd7d7c': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Over the last decade, the total area covered by MPAs in the EU has increased substantially — from 5.9% in 2012 to 12.1% in 2021. Although this trend is positive, the area protected will need to expand at a significantly faster rate than it has in the last decade if the EU is to meet the 30% biodiversity strategy target by 2030.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Over the last decade, the total area covered by MPAs in the EU has increased substantially — from 5.9% in 2012 to 12.1% in 2021. Although this trend is positive, the area protected will need to expand at a significantly faster rate than it has in the last decade if the EU is to meet the 30% biodiversity strategy target by 2030.\xa0'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '24fd9ed3-98bf-497c-b518-9cfffd377e35': {'@type': 'columnsBlock', 'data': {'blocks': {'6d2be5ea-d4e8-4d56-b21c-72b8e56904b1': {'blocks': {'2b3ba42f-35b2-4e5f-8020-385a4d1ad4cf': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': ' Demo sites ', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': ''}, {'children': [{'style-medium-text': True, 'text': 'Demo sites'}], 'type': 'strong'}, {'text': ''}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '83c72d13-7a12-4c84-b38d-8b18f331b307': {'@type': 'slate'}, 'cbe4150d-8c40-4785-ae36-065410dc1aba': {'@type': 'image', 'align': 'center', 'alt': 'marine protected areas.jpg', 'copyright': '', 'copyrightIcon': 'ri-copyright-line', 'size': 'l', 'styles': {}, 'url': '/marine/europe-seas/eu-mission-restore-our-oceans-and-water/mo-indicators/marine-protected-areas/marine-protected-areas.jpg'}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['2b3ba42f-35b2-4e5f-8020-385a4d1ad4cf', 'cbe4150d-8c40-4785-ae36-065410dc1aba', '83c72d13-7a12-4c84-b38d-8b18f331b307']}, 'settings': {'padding': {'bottom': 74, 'left': 74, 'right': 74, 'top': 74}}}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['6d2be5ea-d4e8-4d56-b21c-72b8e56904b1']}}, 'gridCols': ['full'], 'gridSize': 12, 'styles': {}}, '296fc2f7-3096-49b6-b644-1892df2dc1be': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Ensuring more effective management of individual MPAs and their networks should become a major focus in the coming years, as the designation of new MPAs alone will not guarantee the conservation of the EU’s marine ecosystems. The Mission helps creating a coherent network of MPAs to ensure good management practices and coordination across regions. Projects will investigate improvement of practices (ecological and governance) of marine conservation in selected Living Labs including local MPAs, national MPA network processes, regional networks of MPAs. Best practices will then be made available to all MPAs, some through online digital tools created by projects.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Ensuring more effective management of individual MPAs and their networks should become a major focus in the coming years, as the designation of new MPAs alone will not guarantee the conservation of the EU’s marine ecosystems. The Mission helps creating a coherent network of MPAs to ensure good management practices and coordination across regions. Projects will investigate improvement of practices (ecological and governance) of marine conservation in selected Living Labs including local MPAs, national MPA network processes, regional networks of MPAs. Best practices will then be made available to all MPAs, some through online digital tools created by projects.'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '3664c3cb-51a8-4aac-95bf-d7862ea923e2': {'@type': 'columnsBlock', and new areas identified as suitable to become marine protected areas'}], 'type': 'p'}]}], 'key': 'c0bif'}], 'striped': False}}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['e381c0d5-2f49-459b-bb54-c65fa7ab9cd8']}, 'settings': {'backgroundColor': '#004b7f'}}, 'cdab5af0-0980-4e26-8b09-e347c85c6331': {'blocks': {'0e928097-f129-44e6-916c-8987eec8ede1': {'@type': 'slate'}, 'edc19ab5-c4ef-4165-8f63-eb5410856601': {'@type': 'description', 'plaintext': 'One of the key targets of the Biodiversity strategy 2030 is to reach protection of at least 30% of EU seas by 2030, while also ensuring that all protected areas are effectively managed. Despite the EU having made substantial progress in designating new marine protected areas over the past years, the path to 30% target is still uncertain and challenging. Projects and activities funded by the EU Mission Oceans and waters may help gain momentum and increase the rate at which protected areas are designated and properly managed.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'One of the key targets of the '}, {'children': [{'text': 'Biodiversity strategy 2030'}], 'data': {'link': {'external': {'external_link': 'https://environment.ec.europa.eu/strategy/biodiversity-strategy-2030_en', 'target': '_blank'}}}, 'type': 'a'}, {'text': ' is to reach protection of at least 30% of EU seas by 2030, while also ensuring that all protected areas are effectively managed. Despite the EU having made substantial progress in designating new marine protected areas over the past years, the path to 30% target is still uncertain and challenging. Projects and activities funded by the EU Mission Oceans and waters may help gain momentum and increase the rate at which protected areas are designated and properly managed.'}], 'type': 'p'}]}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['edc19ab5-c4ef-4165-8f63-eb5410856601', '0e928097-f129-44e6-916c-8987eec8ede1']}}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['cdab5af0-0980-4e26-8b09-e347c85c6331', '11af6fbe-0acd-41d5-adf8-9441b64d019f']}}, 'gridCols': ['threeFifths', 'twoFifths'], 'gridSize': 12, 'styles': {'borderRadius': 3}}, '3eb66dec-7823-42ef-b04a-25ac185c4624': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Among the tested management practices, adaptive management is a promising solution that involves continuous assessment, adjustments, and flexibility in response to changing environmental conditions and new information. Several projects, such as A-AAgora, EFFECTIVE, and PHAROS, plan to consider the entire ecosystem, including ecological, social, and economic factors, when making management decisions.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Among the tested management practices, adaptive management is a promising solution that involves continuous assessment, adjustments, and flexibility in response to changing environmental conditions and new information. Several projects, such as A-AAgora, EFFECTIVE, and PHAROS, plan to consider the entire ecosystem, including ecological, social, and economic factors, when making management decisions.'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '40ae07c6-059e-4eff-906d-6a44397f3aaf': {'@type': 'group', 'data': {'blocks': {'5ed0f592-0858-4e47-a274-6995773bda8b': {'@type': 'columnsBlock', 'data': {'blocks': {'45c2b8f3-a360-442c-9218-32c71933c41a': {'blocks': {'30c7abe9-df22-45f2-802e-7a47b0dff9bf': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'EEA indicator:', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'EEA indicator:'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '91211b4f-e0a7-4212-b8d0-5c9aeaff1f9a': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Additional resources', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Additional resources'}], 'type': 'h3'}]}, 'a67d8ba8-2f86-487b-b997-6d25916862e6': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': " Marine protected areas in Europe's seas ", 'value': [{'children': [{'children': [{'text': ''}, {'children': [{'text': "Marine protected areas in Europe's seas "}], 'data': {'link': {'external': {'external_link': 'https://www.eea.europa.eu/en/analysis/indicators/marine-protected-areas-in-europes-seas', 'target': '_blank'}}}, 'type': 'a', 'url': 'https://www.eea.europa.eu/en/analysis/indicators/marine-protected-areas-in-europes-seas'}, {'text': ''}], 'type': 'li'}], 'type': 'ul'}]}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['91211b4f-e0a7-4212-b8d0-5c9aeaff1f9a', '30c7abe9-df22-45f2-802e-7a47b0dff9bf', 'a67d8ba8-2f86-487b-b997-6d25916862e6']}}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['45c2b8f3-a360-442c-9218-32c71933c41a']}}, 'gridCols': ['full'], 'gridSize': 12, 'styles': {}}, '7e0525ed-8dfc-40cc-8c07-ccad17500ab3': {'@type': 'slate'}}, 'blocks_layout': {'items': ['5ed0f592-0858-4e47-a274-6995773bda8b', '7e0525ed-8dfc-40cc-8c07-ccad17500ab3']}}, 'styles': {'style_name': 'content-box-gray'}}, '465c14f6-fa0a-4834-8c67-e64ff031451a': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'After completion, the Mission’s projects commit to identify more than 50 new sites which are suitable to be designated as marine protected areas. The size of these sites has not been disclosed by projects at this time. It is important to highlight that while the Mission’s projects can help identify suitable areas, the registration of these areas as MPAs will most likely take place after the end of these projects.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'After completion, the Mission’s projects commit to identify more than 50 new sites which are suitable to be designated as marine protected areas. The size of these sites has not been disclosed by projects at this time. It is important to highlight that while the Mission’s projects can help identify suitable areas, the registration of these areas as MPAs will most likely take place after the end of these projects.\xa0'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '5f5a5929-b2d8-4267-b44a-edb0f6c38a4a': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'MPAs management', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'MPAs management\xa0'}], 'type': 'h3'}]}, '60b6d428-d0a7-44c1-84a1-855db35baf46': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Connectivity', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Connectivity\xa0'}], 'type': 'h3'}]}, '69ba9714-ac6e-4af5-b036-4f1e50500a5a': {'@type': 'title', 'copyrightIcon': 'ri-copyright-line', 'hideContentType': True, 'hideCreationDate': True, 'hideDownloadButton': True, 'hidePublishingDate': True, 'styles': {}, 'subtitle': 'Indicator', 'variation': 'default'}, '755de0b7-a94c-4df5-8a00-7dd63b51917b': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Several projects including PHAROS, OceanCitizen, BLUE CONNECT, EFFECTIVE, and BioProtect have committed to develop tools and modelling frameworks to assess and explicitly consider the spatial interdependence of marine ecosystems. Assessments will for example include the identification and mapping of ecological corridors. Engagement of local communities and stakeholders shall ensure that their knowledge and needs are involved as part of the framework. These tools will enable MPA managers to better understand and manage connectivity by taking into consideration landscape features (such as migratory corridors and sanctuaries) to ensure connectivity between existing and new MPAs.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Several projects including PHAROS, OceanCitizen, BLUE CONNECT, EFFECTIVE, and BioProtect have committed to develop tools and modelling frameworks to assess and explicitly consider the spatial interdependence of marine ecosystems. Assessments will for example include the identification and mapping of ecological corridors. Engagement of local communities and stakeholders shall ensure that their knowledge and needs are involved as part of the framework. These tools will enable MPA managers to better understand and manage connectivity by taking into consideration landscape features (such as migratory corridors and sanctuaries) to ensure connectivity between existing and new MPAs.\r'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '7f558138-feef-4d4c-85b6-9bea9d7e130c': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': '', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': '\r'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, '897be22a-d33f-4e8d-a961-c489a3a7ac82': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Contribution of Mission’s projects', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Contribution of Mission’s projects\xa0'}], 'type': 'h3'}]}, '91a62a79-fe7e-4b70-bedc-3904aa4df557': {'@type': 'dividerBlock', 'hidden': True, 'spacing': 's', 'styles': {}}, '9d84348f-53ea-45db-98bb-71c7847b387f': {'@type': 'dividerBlock', 'hidden': True, 'spacing': 's', 'styles': {}}, 'aaffdc04-7336-44bd-8173-062be6e21288': {'@type': 'slate'}, 'b2eddb1d-3852-443e-af48-145729ceda7d': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Enhancements in connectivity are expected to benefit MPAs’ biodiversity and resilience.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Enhancements in connectivity are expected to benefit MPAs’ biodiversity and resilience.'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, 'ccde095e-c15a-4c69-9f29-24b578d2895b': {'@type': 'dividerBlock', 'hidden': True, 'spacing': 's', 'styles': {}}, 'd8b00216-4790-4de8-85ed-272d6caa1e8b': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'To secure long-term and sustainable management of MPAs, a key focus is engaging with stakeholders as local communities, fishers, and authorities, to promote co-management and co-ownership. This is highlighted by some of the activities conducted by BioProtect and BLUE CONNECT. Some projects such as BLUE CONNECT and PHAROS also plan to explore innovative financial models and funding mechanisms, such as community-based financing and private funding options.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'To secure long-term and sustainable management of MPAs, a key focus is engaging with stakeholders as local communities, fishers, and authorities, to promote co-management and co-ownership. This is highlighted by some of the activities conducted by BioProtect and BLUE CONNECT. Some projects such as BLUE CONNECT and PHAROS also plan to explore innovative financial models and funding mechanisms, such as community-based financing and private funding options.'}], 'type': 'p'}]}, 'd9f2abc4-f76d-4857-9c05-3e0eb7665ead': {'@type': 'slate'}, 'db4cd707-99db-4fe7-b00b-022a3d7a4d68': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'Consolidation and expansion of the MPAs’ network', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'Consolidation and expansion of the MPAs’ network\xa0'}], 'type': 'h3'}]}, 'e425ac60-4664-4550-9d77-b58931ad8f3e': {'@type': 'slate', 'plaintext': 'These projects plan to explore innovative solutions to some of the most pressing challenges faced by Marine Protected Areas (MPAs), including improvement of management practices, the consolidation of the network, and its connectivity to meet targets set by EU policies.', 'value': [{'children': [{'text': 'These projects plan to explore innovative solutions to some of the most pressing challenges faced by Marine Protected Areas (MPAs), including improvement of management practices, the consolidation of the network, and its connectivity to meet targets set by EU policies.'}], 'type': 'p'}]},
